sourcesContent:
import { Router } from 'express';
import { getTask } from '../controllers/task'

const router = Router()

router.get('/task', getTask)
router.get('/task/:id')
router.get('/task/count')
router.post('/task')
router.delete('/task/:id')
router.put('/task/:id')

export default router

import { Router } from 'express';
import { getTask } from '../controllers/task'

const router = Router()

router.get('/task', getTask)
router.get('/task/:id')
router.get('/task/count')
router.post('/task')
router.delete('/task/:id')
router.put('/task/:id')

export default router

import { Router } from 'express';
import { createTask, deleteTask, getTask, getTaskCount, getTasks, updateTask } from '../controllers/tasks'

const router = Router()

router.get('/tasks', getTasks)
router.get('/tasks/:id', getTask)
router.get('/tasks/count', getTaskCount)  
router.post('/tasks', createTask)
router.delete('/tasks/:id', deleteTask)
router.put('/tasks/:id', updateTask)

export default router

import { Router } from 'express';
import { createTask, deleteTask, getTask, getTaskCount, getTasks, updateTask } from '../controllers/tasks'

const router = Router()

router.get('/tasks', getTasks)
router.get('/tasks/:id', getTask)
router.get('/tasks/count', getTaskCount)  
router.post('/tasks', createTask)
router.delete('/tasks/:id', deleteTask)
router.put('/tasks/:id', updateTask)

export default router

export const config = {
    host: '127.0.0.1',
    port: '3306',
    user:'root',
    password: 'siemens',
    database: 'proyecto_db'
}

import { Router } from 'express';
import { createTask, deleteTask, getTask, getTaskCount, getTasks, updateTask } from '../controllers/tasks'

const router = Router()

router.get('/tasks', getTasks)
router.get('/tasks/:id', getTask)
router.get('/tasks/count', getTaskCount)  
router.post('/tasks', createTask)
router.delete('/tasks/:id', deleteTask)
router.put('/tasks/:id', updateTask)

export default router

import { Router } from 'express';
import { createUser, deleteUser, getUser, getUsers, getUsersCount, updateUser } from '../controllers/users'

const router = Router()

router.get('/users', getUsers)
router.get('/users/:id', getUser)
router.get('/users/count', getUsersCount)  
router.post('/users', createUser)
router.delete('/users/:id', deleteUser)
router.put('/users/:id', updateUser)

export default router

import { Router } from 'express';
import { createUser, deleteUser, getUser, getUsers, getUsersCount, loginUser, updateUser } from '../controllers/users'

const router = Router()

router.get('/users', getUsers)
router.get('/users/:id', getUser)
router.get('/users/count', getUsersCount) 
router.post('/users', createUser)
router.delete('/users/:id', deleteUser)
router.put('/users/:id', updateUser)
router.post('/login', loginUser)

export default router

import { Router } from 'express';
import { createUser, deleteUser, getUser, getUsers, getUsersCount, loginUser, updateUser } from '../controllers/users'

const router = Router()

router.get('/users', getUsers)
router.get('/users/:id', getUser)
router.get('/users/count', getUsersCount) 
router.post('/users', createUser)
router.delete('/users/:id', deleteUser)
router.put('/users/:id', updateUser)
router.post('/login', loginUser)

export default router

import { Router } from 'express';
import { createUser, deleteUser, getUser, getUsers, getUsersCount, loginUser, updateUser } from '../controllers/users'

const router = Router()

router.get('/users', getUsers)
router.get('/users/:id', getUser)
router.get('/users/count', getUsersCount) 
router.post('/users', createUser)
router.delete('/users/:id', deleteUser)
router.put('/users/:id', updateUser)
router.post('/login', loginUser)

export default router
